name: Twisted Lands: Shadow Town - Collector's Edition
summary: Fight your terror as darkness descends in Twisted Lands - Shadow Town, an unforgettable search that takes fear to the next level. A relic hunter and his wife are out to sea when an artifact causes their boat to capsize. Now shipwrecked on a strange island, and his wife missing, the collector searches a wretched town for signs of life, but he is not prepared for the horrors that await.
